title: Lumin installers

blocks.installers_home_title: Smart Circuits, Smart Energy, Smart Business
blocks.installers_home_subtitle|raw: Lumin enables a smarter whole house backup system that aligned with customer expectations, leading to easier sales and happier customers.

blocks.installers_map_title: We work with Distributors in 50 states

blocks.installers_why_lumin_subtitle_cert: As one of our Lumin Certified Installers put it, “Lumin makes batteries operate the way homeowners think they should.” As an easy-to-install addition to ordinary electric panels, Lumin delivers big benefits for homeowners and installers – faster and easier ESS installations, happier customers, and fewer support calls when the power goes out.

blocks.feedbacks_subtitle: Lumin provides the most versatile platform to generate value from energy assets at the grid edge.

blocks.question_subtitle|raw: Here you can find answers to the most common questions about Lumin and our products. Where did the company name come from? What professional certificates does the system have, and much more.

question_lists.text_list|raw: Lumin Edge is initially targeted for demand response applications, but will also be available for solar + storage additional audiences later this year.

blocks.have_questions_subtitle: We have answers. Our specialists are ready to talk.
